title: EF’s Tour de France Yellow Jersey Surprise: ‘It Was Touch or Go That We Were Going to Bring Carapaz’
content:
No one dreamed that Carapaz could put the American squad into yellow so soon: 'That's the crazy nature of our sport.'

Read the full article at EF’s Tour de France Yellow Jersey Surprise: ‘It Was Touch or Go That We Were Going to Bring Carapaz’ on Velo.
author: ahood
